name: BATinBAT
description:
This is a text-based game.

You are Batman (This is where the name comes).
You play many of days.
Each Day has 3 Sections: Morning, Midday, Evening.
In every Section a question appears and you have to answer it correctly.
For example: What do you want to do next?
1) Something
2) I dont care
3) Shut up!
